name: Wild Rice and Barley Pilaf
keywords: pearl barley, pine nuts, wild rice, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup dried cranberries, softened in 1 cup hot water
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Bring three cups of the water to boil, add salt and wild rice. Lower heat and simmer, covered, for about 45 minutes or until water is absorbed.
In another pot, bring the remaining water to boil and add barley. Lower heat and simmer for 30 minutes or until tender.
Mix together the rice, barley, cranberries, pine nuts, oil and lemon. Season with thyme, salt, and pepper.
